CHAT.comment: VIRGINIA, Petitioner v. KEVIN LAMONT HICKS
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM H. HURD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN D. BENJAMIN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
